pageContext.claim: “Deflation is -- we have no inflation. If anything, it's going below the number so, therefore, we're entitled to an interest rate cut.”
pageContext.analysis: Inflation as measured by prices for consumer products has been growing slowly this year, but on the other hand, wage growth has been stagnant, which on net reduces consumers' purchasing power. The Federal Reserve, as a central bank in charge of monetary policy, is politically independent. Its job is not to help the president's short-term political goals but to ensure the long-term stability of the U.S. economy.
